name: Kelin's Delivery: Rain
description:
Kelin has a job to deliver a package to her client. However, rain comes and Kelin has to stay in an unused old house because the path to cave is blocked. She is also hungry. Help Kelin find food and something to rid the cave block in the old house with adventure gameplay mechanic!

How to Play

Examine front, obtain item, use item on front, or combine item.

  • Arrow: To move to certain direction
  • Z: Examine, Action
  • X: Inventory, Cancel
  • Enter: Pause menu
Last Changelog
  • v1.3 (August 11th, 2018 UTC)
    • Slight change to Kelin sprite to convince more that she is carrying bag
    • Added alternative way to clean candle lefover
    • Added more messages on some item uses
    • Slight changes to carpet and floor sprites
    • Changed on title screen to fit copytight text
    • Changed credit screen to reduce redundancy
    • Some fixes on grammar errors
